Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the New York city charter, in relation to the disposition of real property of the city
Items.MatterName: Disposition of real property of the city.

Items.Title: A Local Law in relation to a study on the feasibility of establishing a social housing agency and the repeal of this local law upon the expiration thereof
Items.MatterName: Study on the feasibility of establishing a social housing agency and the repeal of this local law upon the expiration thereof.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to creating a land bank

A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to giving qualified entities a first opportunity to purchase and an opportunity to submit an offer to purchase certain residential buildings when offered for sale
Items.MatterName: Giving qualified entities a first opportunity to purchase and an opportunity to submit an offer to purchase certain residential buildings when offered for sale.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to defining community land trusts for the provision of services in addition to housing that benefit the local community
Items.MatterName: Defining community land trusts for the provision of services in addition to housing that benefit the local community.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to community land trust regulatory agreements for the provision of services in addition to housing that benefit the local community
Items.MatterName: Community land trust regulatory agreements for the provision of services in addition to housing that benefit the local community.

Items.Title: Resolution calling on the New York State Legislature to pass and the Governor to sign, legislation mandating that any owner intending to sell a multi-unit residential dwelling, must first make a fairly appraised offer of sale to the tenants within the residence before making any sale offers to third parties.
Items.MatterName: Mandating that any owner intending to sell a multi-unit residential dwelling, must first make a fairly appraised offer of sale to the tenants within the residence before making any sale offers to third parties.

Items.Title: Resolution calling on the New York State Legislature to pass, and the Governor to sign, A.9088/S.8494, in relation to creating a public benefit corporation for the construction, acquisition, and rehabilitation of permanently affordable housing.
Items.MatterName: Creating a public benefit corporation for the construction, acquisition, and rehabilitation of permanently affordable housing (A.9088/S.8494).

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to deadlines for installing natural gas detectors and to repeal section 8 of local law 157 for the year 2016 relating thereto
Items.MatterName: Deadlines for installing natural gas detectors and to repeal section 8 of local law 157 for the year 2016 relating thereto.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the New York city building code, in relation to requiring a solid acceptable color or the display of artwork on temporary protective structures on construction sites
Items.MatterName: Requiring a solid acceptable color or the display of artwork on temporary protective structures on construction sites.

Items.Title: A Local Law in relation to the establishment of a Wards Island affordable housing task force
Items.MatterName: Establishment of a Wards Island affordable housing task force.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to notices in connection with rent increase exemptions, real property tax abatements, and exemptions from payments in lieu of taxes for certain properties occupied by senior citizens or persons with disabilities
Items.MatterName: Notices in connection with rent increase exemptions, real property tax abatements, and exemptions from payments in lieu of taxes for certain properties occupied by senior citizens or persons with disabilities.
